    CipherTest
    Use the Cipher stuff in javax.crypto
    DisplayButtonGroup
    A simple implementation of a button group, assuming buttons of type DDButton, which shows buttons as selected for a specific Display

    Implement a JSlider.
    HelloWorld  
    HSBColor
    Generate a set of colors that are (in theory) as distinct as possible from each other.
    JLabelCenter
    Helper class for building the Splash Screen for the channel selector.
    JLabelFooter
    A single-purpose instance of JLabel to show the status of the Display at the bottom of the ChannelSelector screen Adjusts the text within the label to fit in the provided space.
    SimpleMouseListener
    A listener to attach to a Component to help the caller select a JCardLayout card when clicked.
    SplashScreens
    Utility class for ChannelSelector to deal with the splash screens on the touch-panel displays

    Some general utilities in the DD system
